content: note current version is dated july 29 2013 a pattern developed for the at&t fiber to the world yarn club and wool-aid specifically for charity knitting this is a simple sturdy sock made holding two strands of yarn together one strand of worsted weight wool and one strand of sock yarn the pattern calls for two sizes of needles the smaller needles are used for the cuff heel and toe to create a tighter stronger fabric at those stress points
